summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 45E, page 119 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located in the vicinity of 2611 South Dearborn Street from Lowrise 2 and Lowrise Duplex/Triplex to Lowrise 3; and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith, to implement the Central Area Neighborhood Plan.
